worklogs.comment:
mrkn commented on pull request #4670: ARROW-5704: [C++] Stop using ARROW_TEMPLATE_EXPORT for SparseTensorImpl
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4670
 
 
   I'd like to stop using ARROW_TEMPLATE_EXPORT for SparseTensorImpl class so that it can be wrapped in Arrow GLib library on the mingw platform.
   
   This is the continuation of #3509.

fields.description:
I'd like to stop using ARROW_TEMPLATE_EXPORT for SparseTensorImpl class so that it can be wrapped in Arrow GLib library on the mingw platform.

 

This relates to ARROW-4399.
fields.summary: [C++] Stop using ARROW_TEMPLATE_EXPORT for SparseTensorImpl class
